name: Package Retrieval Man
description:
Your name is Damon McConaughey. Your job is to retrieve packages from dangerous alien planets.  Standing between you and your goals are ghostly anomalies hellbent on stopping you.

Inspired by Pac-Man. Package Retrieval Man is entirely in first person, with 3 different mazes on 3 different alien planets, and a short story campaign that will walk you through the mechanics.

Submitted for the Houdini Game Jam 2020. Features heavy use of the Houdini software by SideFX.

Features music from We Found A Map

https://wefoundamap.bandcamp.com/album/to-the-robot-graveyard
